reviews.review: Worst movie Iâ€™ve ever seen. Spoiler alert... ending sucks.

Great movie. Great movie. Great movie. Incredible, inventive, and groundbreaking! I LOVED this movie and had a smile throughout and even at the...end.... I think it is nearly flawless as a film and Marvel is absolutely crushing it! Best movie franchise ever.
If you hate The Last Jedi for its excessive amount of plot holes but love Infinity War, congratulations on being a huge hypocrite.

Avengers Infinity War is one of my favorite Marvel films as far as watchability just to see the dynamics between different characters. It has some great fight scenes, visuals and leaves you wondering what comes next to the characters. Is there a way back to solve the problems? The choreography for the battle sequences in this film look amazing. This film also has some unique visuals of a star getting started up that has never been seen before on screen. I love the score by Alan Silverstri. This film takes place immediately after Thor Ragnarok. This is one film where you defiantly need to see particular films in order to understand this film like Dr. Strange, Thor Ragnarok, Captain America Civil War, Guardians of the Galaxy part one. This has you wondering is there a way to bring characters back? I love the chemistry between all the characters. This is a film worth seeing on the big screen to be able to see all the visuals. I like the team split up in this film of the Guardians. It was great. This film tells us there is no Guardians of the Galaxy 3, Spider-Man sequel, Black Panther sequel, until Avengers 4 comes out. You have to stay for the Post credits to see what happens to SHIELD This has one single post credit scene after all the credits that is kind of important to the film after Ant-Man and the Wasp and Avengers part 4.
best movie of the year period
Great movie overall my expectations got blown off the window and a great shocking ending

Infinity War is an amazing and thrilling entree into the marvel universe. It balances emotional and dark moments with humor that works unlike some other marvel movies. The films has a sympathetic villain who is also intimidating.
Did not feel positive when leaving the theatre.  Bummed out, more like it.

My favorite Marvel film by far. This film brings the stories of the past 10 years together perfectly. Thanos is an excellent main character and is so much more than what we thought he would be. This is his film and it was done brilliantly!
